text: Parpan used to be a municipality of the district Plessur of the canton of Graubünden in Switzerland. On 1 January 2010, the municipalities of Malix and Parpan became part of Churwalden. == References == == Other websites == * Official website of Parpan * Bergbahn Rothorn * Bergbahn Danis Stätz AG Category:Former municipalities of Graubünden
title: Parpan
